entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 11:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries along the Strait. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
